Title: Lilting
Actors: Ben Whishaw, Pei-Pei Cheng, Andrew Leung, Morven Christie
Plot: In contemporary London, a Cambodian-Chinese mother mourns the untimely death of her son. Her world is further disrupted by the presence of a stranger. We observe their difficulties in trying to connect with each other without a common language as, through a translator, they begin to piece together memories of a man they both loved.
Awards: Nominated for 1 BAFTA Film Award. Another 4 wins & 4 nominations.
